body:
### Steps to reproduce

On macOS, run:
```console
$ spack audit packages
```

### Error message

Spack reports thousands of CUDA version issues because CUDA is not supported on macOS:
```console
$ spack audit packages
```

### Information on your system

* **Spack:** 0.17.0-751-b23bd81cd9
* **Python:** 3.8.12
* **Platform:** darwin-catalina-ivybridge
* **Concretizer:** clingo


### General information

- [X] I have run `spack debug report` and reported the version of Spack/Python/Platform

title: spack audit packages: CUDA issues on macOS
